thread.title: BRIEF-Bandwidth Posts Q4 Adj. Earnings Per Share $0.09

title: BRIEF-Bandwidth Posts Q4 Adj. Earnings Per Share $0.09
text: February 21, 2018 / 9:15 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Bandwidth Posts Q4 Adj. Earnings Per Share $0.09 Reuters Staff Feb 21 (Reuters) - Bandwidth Inc: * BANDWIDTH ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.09 * Q4 REVENUE $42.5 MILLION VERSUS $38.8 MILLION * Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $0.04 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * ‍FULL YEAR 2018​ TOTAL REVENUE IS EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $188.0 MILLION TO $190.0 MILLION * ‍FULL YEAR 2018 NON-GAAP EPS IS EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF APPROXIMATELY BREAKEVEN TO A LOSS OF $0.11 PER SHARE​ * ‍Q1 2018 TOTAL REVENUE IS EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $47.0 MILLION TO $47.5 MILLION.​ * ‍Q1 2018 NON-GAAP EPS IS EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $0.07 TO $0.10 PER SHARE​ * ‍NUMBER OF ACTIVE CPAAS CUSTOMERS WAS 965 AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2017, AN INCREASE OF 21% FROM 798 AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2016​ * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.34, REVENUE VIEW $181.3 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.06, REVENUE VIEW $42.3 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.00, REVENUE VIEW $41.7 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
